tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We would like to thank Padma priya mam and her team . I consulted Padma priya mam for my first delivery she is really superb .I knew her for past 5 years . She is so kind and good inspiration to all womens. She always insist on normal delivery & monitors weight gain regularly. She made my first delivery normal. Now I consulted her for my second delivery she again made it normal. She gave me lots of hope and encouragement even though I gained weight during my first pregnancy. She gave me confidence to deliver my baby boy having a single loop of cord around neck weighted 3.5kg without taking epidural on 29th October .Padmapriya mam and her team is really superb who took great care of us. I would like to thank all doctors in her team . Her team work is really appreciable .kudoos to all doctors who brings happiness among mothers delivering babies.I would like to thank you once again for the excellent care you provided me the past nine months. There are not enough words to describe how thankful we are for your wonderful care during my pregnancy, labor & delivery. Words can't express the love and appreciation I have in my heart for all of you!Thanks for nurturing the baby and me through this pregnancy!My husband and I would like to thank you for taking part in the birth of our both kids.We felt very comfortable and confident knowing that you would be able to handle any situation if one was to arise. You are amazing! You knew when to be serious and when to make us laugh. We will never forget you doctor.Thank you so much from the bottom of hearts for taking such good care of us during/after the pregnancy as well as the delivery!! Because of your professionalism and great smiles, we felt like we were in good hands and that gave us peace of mind towards the big day. Thank you for helping deliver the most precious gift of our life!!‚ÄùThank you all for all the care you have given us over the past few years.You have all been so kind.‚Äù‚ÄúThanks for everything you do!‚Äù

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
**** ****** ********* Doctor had recommended USG investigation during previous visit which wasn't reviewed by the doctor in the current visit. 
She had been informed that patient is diabetic during the previous visit and the latest HBA1C was also shared, however, doctor just advised USG & other blood investigations. During current visit,  doctor simply deferred the treatment for a month due to HBA1C being higher than required. This HBA1C had been shared previously and doctor did not mention about the required HBA1C level during previous visit. Doctor and assistants were just waiting to wrap up for the day.
Had a complete loss of confidence and decided to change the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I always love the way how Dr Padmapriya Vivek has a warm smile when ever i get to meet her. The simple ways of explaining an issue & pointing the problem to the point is awesome. Doctor usually has a lot of patients waiting for her and meanwhile emergency cases to be addressed that's why there is quite a lot waiting time somedays, the wait is worth. 
Heart Felt thanks to Dear Dr Padmapriya Vivek

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Today we consulted Dr. Padmapriya for my wife's frequent UTI.  The doctor was very patient - friendly.Doctor explained the possible cause and suggested all possible and most practical solutions for day to day practice.  As an attendant I felt that the doctor really stepped into  my wife's shoes and suggested the practice to be followed to avoid any further recurrence.    Actually,  the doctor took Anatomy class with a diagram and explained my wife's possible condition. for her ailments.    I am extremely happy and would recommend her to all my friends and family.   The Doctor  is one doctor on whom any patient can rely upon and trust fully.  Thanks to Global Hospital.   I understood that the Doctor is famous for pregnancy and delivery.  This I record for the  benefit  of young couplesby Kasiviswanathan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very nice and treat me like her own child.she always make me easy in every problem and I love her way of communication. Nisha mam is also very nice she also help me alot in my every prob and make me comfortable thats why I had more confidence is every going good.my first pregnancy some complications that's why I am afraid to when I am second time pregnant but because of doctor treat me so nicely so that time I have a healthy pregnancy and healthy baby . Thanks to all staff and nurses and supporting staff everyone is very helpfull.

Absolutely we are overwhelmed with the care & support provided by Dr Padmapriya Vivek .From day one of the visit she was very positive on her approach towards us, she motivated on every consultation on seeing the scans, tests & condition of baby & mother , this has given us some real good confidence ,She have very good team of doctors & nurses associated with her, We are very much thankful for the support you given us.
we are extremely happy to have you as our Doctor , these 5 stars are not enough would give you infinite stars üòä

With Thanks
Annie & Dheeben

Highlights of Doctor:
1. Very well brilliant & experienced , **** ** ****
2. Positive approach
3. Clear assessment on scans & test and doing countermeasure for the same
4. Supports in any crucial time for delivery
5. Focuses on Normal delivery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ********** *** **** ****** *** *** **** ***** *** *** Just follow her instructions and you and your baby are in best health. We are super happy that we had our baby delivered under her supervision. Nothing but THE BEST.
Too crowded, too much wait time and the doc just wanted to wrap up the appointment ASAP and move on to other patients. She didn't even look at the blood report.

review: ********* ****** *** there * was cord around my baby's neck but she did normal delivery in 2 hours without any complications. Wonderful doctor and took well care throughout my wife pregnancy.

review: Dr. Padmapriya Vivek is a great doctor who was suggested to me by a close friend. I took my sister to her clinic regularly for checkups when she was pregnant.  She's kind and explains things well. Very satisfied.
